00033 void UDPHeader::GetSourcePort(unsigned short &port) const
00034 {
00035   GetData((char*)&port,2,0);
00036   port=ntohs(port);
00037 }

00039 void UDPHeader::SetSourcePort(const unsigned short &port, const Packet &p)
00040 {
00041   unsigned short pt=htons(port);
00042   SetData((char*)&pt,2,0);
00043   RecomputeChecksum(p);

00073 unsigned short UDPHeader::ComputeChecksum(const Packet &p) const
00074 {
00075   // assumes we DO have an IP header in the packet already
00076   IPHeader iph= (IPHeader &) p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00077   IPAddress srcip, destip;
00078   unsigned char proto;
00079 
00080   iph.GetSourceIP(srcip); srcip=htonl(srcip);
00081   iph.GetDestIP(destip); destip=htonl(destip);
00082   iph.GetProtocol(proto);
00083 
00084   unsigned short len, buflen;
00085 
00086   GetLength(len);
00087 
00088   buflen=((12+len)+(len%2?1:0))/2;
00089 
00090   unsigned short buf[buflen];
00091 
00092   memset((char*)buf,0,2*buflen);
00093 
00094   memcpy((char*)buf,&srcip,4);
00095   memcpy((char*)(buf+2),&destip,4);
00096   buf[4]= htons((unsigned short)proto);
00097   buf[5]= htons(len);
00098 
00099   GetData((char*)&(buf[6]),UDP_HEADER_LENGTH,0);
00100 
00101   //YUCK
00102   ((Packet&)p).GetPayload().GetData((char*)(buf+10),len-UDP_HEADER_LENGTH,0);
00103 
00104   return ~(OnesComplementSum(buf,buflen));
00105 }

00109 bool UDPHeader::IsCorrectChecksum(const Packet &p) const
00110 {
00111   unsigned short c;
00112   GetChecksum(c);
00113   if (c==0) {
00114     return true;
00115   } else {
00116     return ComputeChecksum(p)==0;
00117   }
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 void UDPHeader::RecomputeChecksum(const Packet &p)
00122 {
00123   unsigned short len;
00124   SetChecksum(0);
00125   GetLength(len);
00126   if (len>=UDP_HEADER_LENGTH) {
00127     unsigned short ck=ComputeChecksum(p);
00128     SetChecksum(ck);
00129   }
00130 }
00131

00133 void UDPHeader::GetChecksum(unsigned short &checksum) const
00134 {
00135   GetData((char*)&checksum,2,6);
00136   checksum=ntohs(checksum);
00137 }
00138 
00139 void UDPHeader::SetChecksum(const unsigned short &checksum)
00140 {
00141   unsigned short c=htons(checksum);
00142   SetData((char*)&c,2,6);
00143 }

00145 std::ostream & UDPHeader::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00146 {
00147   unsigned short srcport, destport, len, checksum;
00148 
00149   GetSourcePort(srcport);
00150   GetDestPort(destport);
00151   GetLength(len);
00152   GetChecksum(checksum);
00153 
00154   os << "UDPHeader(srcport="<<srcport
00155      << ", destport="<<destport
00156      << ", len="<<len
00157      << ", checksum="<<checksum
00158      << ")";
00159 
00160   return os;
00161 }
